text:
I am not sure about other facilities but the squash courts seriously need some attention.  The courts are dirty with flakes of wall paint especially court # 4. The fans look like they have never been cleaned before for they are caked with dirt.  To add on, I noticed the presence of cobwebs on the lighting in the bathroom. Seriously, such lack of care is not justified.

Frankly, I do not ask much from a public facility but  the management in charge should at least ensure that the premises are clean enough for people to workout.
Excellent sporting facilities not modern but convenient and well maintained
